metadata.title: Friday, 4th December, 2020
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a) how many solar powered hammer mills were installed in Mkushi North Parliamentary Constituency as of December, 2019;
(b) how many were operational as of the same date; and
(c) how many hammer mills are earmarked for installation in 2020.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) why the construction of Kanaji Chilanda Secondary School in Kabompo District which is over 80% complete has stalled;
(b) whether funds have been allocated to complete the outstanding works;
(c) if not, what the cause of the delay in allocating the funds is; and

(d) what the time frame for the completion of the remaining works is. NOTICE OF MOTION The Acting Minister of Finance Supply: That the House do now resolve into Committee of Supply to consider Supplementary Estimates No.1 of 2020. __________________________
